Html:
Hello,

thank you for sharing your wonderful Project. I made an applikation which should help our customer support giving our customers addresses of retailers in a specific radius around their Location.

To achieve this i have to iterate to our retailer list (approx 3500 entries) and set markers for them on the map. I only have the adresses of the retailers but not the lat/lng values.

For some reason the program finds about 3450 retailers when im running it in debug or released version on my development engine. This rate would be acceptable for us to use it the way it is. If I use the programm from another workstation the amount of not found locations raises to over 1000.

Am I doing something wrong or am I missing something important? 
`Private Sub Form1_Load(sender As Object, e As EventArgs) Handles MyBase.Load
        'Kartenmaterial festlegen und die Zoomart von Mouse auf Centerzoom stellen
        Me.GMapControl1.MapProvider = GMap.NET.MapProviders.GoogleMapProvider.Instance
        GMap.NET.MapProviders.GoogleMapProvider.Language = LanguageType.German
        GMapControl1.MouseWheelZoomType = MouseWheelZoomType.ViewCenter
        GMapControl1.Manager.Mode = AccessMode.ServerAndCache

        'Credentials mitgeben und Karte auf Mönchengladbach setzen
        GMapProvider.WebProxy = WebRequest.GetSystemWebProxy
        GMapProvider.WebProxy.Credentials = CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials
        GMapControl1.SetPositionByKeywords("Mönchengladbach")

        'Zoombereich definieren
        Me.GMapControl1.MinZoom = 0
        Me.GMapControl1.MaxZoom = 20
        Me.GMapControl1.Zoom = 10
        Me.GMapControl1.ShowCenter = False

        'Radius auf Standardwert '25km' setzen
        cboRadius.SelectedIndex = 1

        'Marker auf Karte zulassen
        GMapControl1.MarkersEnabled = True

        'Funktionsaufruf zum Einlesen der Händlerdaten
        AddCustomers()

        'Overlays der Karte zuweisen
        GMapControl1.Overlays.Add(CircleOverlay)
        GMapControl1.Overlays.Add(InactiveOverlay)
        GMapControl1.Overlays.Add(MarkersOverlay)

    End Sub``
`For Each item In Customers
            search = item.Address & ", " & item.Post_Code & ", " & item.City

            If GMapControl1.SetPositionByKeywords(search) = GeoCoderStatusCode.G_GEO_SUCCESS Then

                Dim Logo As Bitmap

                If item.Inactive = True Then
                    Logo = New Bitmap(My.Resources.Inactive, 35, 40)
                    Try
                        Dim marker As New VarisolMarker(New GMap.NET.PointLatLng(GMapControl1.Position.Lat, GMapControl1.Position.Lng), Logo, item.Name, item.Address, item.City, _
                        item.Phone_No, item.E_Mail, CStr(item.Credit_Limit_LCY), item.Home_Page, item.Payment_Terms_Code, item.Post_Code, _
                        item.Salesperson_Code, item.Shipping_Agent_Code, item.No, item.Contact)
                        marker.ToolTipText = "Firma: " & item.Name & vbCrLf & "Adresse: " & item.Address & vbCrLf & item.Post_Code & item.City & vbCrLf & "Telefon: " & item.Phone_No & vbCrLf & "E-Mail: " & item.E_Mail & vbCrLf & "Web: " & item.Home_Page & vbCrLf & "Kreditlimit: " & item.Credit_Limit_LCY & vbCrLf & " Zahlungsbedingungscode: " & item.Payment_Terms_Code
                        InactiveOverlay.Markers.Add(marker)
                        marker.Inactive = item.Inactive
                        InactiveMarkers.Add(marker)
                        marker.IsVisible = False
                    Catch ex As Exception
                        MessageBox.Show(ex.Message)
                    End Try
                Else
                    Select Case item.Salesperson_Code
                        Case "BEUTTLER"
                            Logo = New Bitmap(My.Resources.Beuttler, 35, 40)
                        Case "HV-BEUTT"
                            Logo = New Bitmap(My.Resources.Kiehn, 35, 40)
                        Case "CHRÖ"
                            Logo = New Bitmap(My.Resources.Roedelbronn, 35, 40)
                        Case "AHRENS"
                            Logo = New Bitmap(My.Resources.Ahrens, 35, 40)
                        Case "VOß"
                            Logo = New Bitmap(My.Resources.Voß, 35, 40)
                        Case "KLINGS"
                            Logo = New Bitmap(My.Resources.Klings, 35, 40)
                        Case "MÜLLER"
                            Logo = New Bitmap(My.Resources.Müller, 35, 40)
                        Case "CONRAD"
                            Logo = New Bitmap(My.Resources.Conrad, 35, 40)
                        Case "MANTINGH"
                            Logo = New Bitmap(My.Resources.Mantingh, 35, 40)
                        Case Else
                            Logo = New Bitmap(My.Resources._Else, 35, 40)
                    End Select

                    Try
                        Dim marker As New VarisolMarker(New GMap.NET.PointLatLng(GMapControl1.Position.Lat, GMapControl1.Position.Lng), Logo, item.Name, item.Address, item.City, _
                        item.Phone_No, item.E_Mail, CStr(item.Credit_Limit_LCY), item.Home_Page, item.Payment_Terms_Code, item.Post_Code, _
                        item.Salesperson_Code, item.Shipping_Agent_Code, item.No, item.Contact)
                        marker.ToolTipText = "Firma: " & item.Name & vbCrLf & "Adresse: " & item.Address & vbCrLf & item.Post_Code & item.City & vbCrLf & "Telefon: " & item.Phone_No & vbCrLf & "E-Mail: " & item.E_Mail & vbCrLf & "Web: " & item.Home_Page & vbCrLf & "Kreditlimit: " & item.Credit_Limit_LCY & vbCrLf & " Zahlungsbedingungscode: " & item.Payment_Terms_Code
                        MarkersOverlay.Markers.Add(marker)
                        marker.Inactive = item.Inactive
                        Markers.Add(marker)
                        marker.IsVisible = False
                    Catch ex As Exception
                        MessageBox.Show(ex.Message)
                    End Try
                End If
            Else
                Dim MissedCust As New MissedCustomer
                MissedCust.Code = CStr(GMapControl1.SetPositionByKeywords(search))
                MissedCust.Name = item.Name
                MissedCust.Address = item.Address
                MissedCust.PostCode = item.Post_Code
                MissedCust.City = item.City
                MissedCust.Country = item.Country_Region_Code
                MissedCust.Inactive = item.Inactive
                FailedCustomers.Add(MissedCust)
                ToolStripMenuItem1.Text = CStr(miss + 1)
                miss += 1
            End If
            lblLoad.Text = "Händler " & counter & " von " & Customers.Count & " wird gesucht..."
            pbLoad.Value = counter
            Me.Refresh()
            counter += 1
        Next``
Thanks for any advice to improve my application

Hello,

you can delete this thread. I changed the project that it uses serialization so im fine now.

Again: thanks for your great work!
